QuestData.Title: Pooped
QuestData.Description: <As you approach the pen, the serpent zips into a corner and hides.>$B$BAs it looks at you with bashful eyes, you can tell that someone has gotten out of its pen and had... an accident.$B$BWell, at the rate that the serpent's been eating, it had to come out the other end... somewhere.$B$BYou had better find the serpent's poop and clean it up before the Serpent Masters find out.
